messages.content: Let's play  a game of tic-tac-toe. You go first.

Okay, let's play! I'll go first.

| | | |
---+---+---
| A | B |
---+---+---
| C | D |
---+---+---

What do you think I should do next?

You could place a X on the next move.

| | | |
---+---+---
| A | B |
---+---+---
| X | X |
---+---+---

This would leave you with a 3 X 3 grid.
